correspondence.message: Hi, I have a small confusion regarding the thesis submission. I have started my masters thesis in mid March and registered it through the CIT portal. Is a physical submission required, or is electronic submission sufficient? I couldn't find a clear answer on the CIT websites for theses started after 15.01, so I wanted to be sure to prevent any issues. Thank you for your time."
It is sufficient that you upload your thesis in the CIT portal.
